searchSql.baseSql:
select * from ( SELECT ART.ID_ AS taskID, ART.CREATE_TIME_ createTime, ART.NAME_ AS taskName, ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS taskCode, ART.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INST_CODE, ART.DELEGATION_ AS DELEGATION, tw.CASE_CODE caseCode, swt.WFE_CATAGORY prdType, tpi.PROPERTY_ADDR addr, tpi.PROPERTY_CODE propertyCode, ttp.EST_PART_TIME todoTime, tci.AGENT_PHONE, tci.AGENT_NAME, su.EMPLOYEE_CODE, iif(tps.IS_MANUAL_SET = 1 ,'true','false' ) planChangePermit, tw.BIZ_CODE srvCode, swt.WFE_NAME as wfeName, sd.name caseStatus, su2.REAL_NAME qiantai, tc.org_id orgId, case when ttp.EST_PART_TIME is null then '2' when datediff(day, GETDATE(), ttp.EST_PART_TIME) < 0 then '-1' when datediff(day, GETDATE(), ttp.EST_PART_TIME) = 0 then '0' when datediff(day, GETDATE(), ttp.EST_PART_TIME) > 0 then '1' else 2 end taskTag FROM sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ART INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW AS tw ON ART.PROC_INST_ID_ = tw.INST_CODE left join sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO tpi on tpi.case_code = tw.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN ttp on ttp.case_code = tw.CASE_CODE and ttp.PART_CODE = ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ inner join sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO tci on tci.CASE_CODE=tw.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.sys_user su on su.id = tci.AGENT_CODE left join sctrans.t_ts_task_plan_set tps on tps.part_code = art.TASK_DEF_KEY_ left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE swt on swt.WFE_CODE = tw.BUSINESS_KEY left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE tc on tci.case_code = tc.case_code left join sctrans.sys_dict sd on sd.code = tc.status left join sctrans.sys_user su2 on su2.id = tc.LEADING_PROCESS_ID WHERE ART.ASSIGNEE_ = #userLoginName# AND ART.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = '1' <ifNotNull q_text> and ( tci.AGENT_NAME like '%' + #q_text# + '%' or tpi.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #q_text# + '%' or ART.NAME_ like '%' + #q_text# + '%' or EXISTS (select 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO tgi where tgi.case_code = tci.case_code and tgi.GUEST_NAME like '%' + #q_text# + '%' ) ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull allType> AND ART.DELEGATION_ IS NULL </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guestname> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = tw.CASE_CODE and GUEST_NAME LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' ) </ifNotNull> ) as AB where 1=1
and taskCode in('PurchaseLimit','Pricing','TaxReview','LoanClose','Guohu','HouseBookGet','serviceRestartApply','serviceRestartApprove','ManagerAduit','SuperManagerAudit','DirectorAudit','LoanlostApply','LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveSeniorManager','LoanlostApproveDirector','InvalidCaseApprove')
<ifNotNull taskTag> and AB.taskTag in (#taskTag#) </ifNotNull> <when test ="isSubscribeFilter==0"> and AB.SUBSCRIBE_COUNT>0 </when> <when test ="isSubscribeFilter==1"> and AB.SUBSCRIBE_COUNT=0 </when> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO TP where TP.CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE AND TP.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull agentName> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and AGENT_NAME like '%'+#agentName#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull agentName> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and AGENT_NAME like '%'+#agentName#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull agentOrgName> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and GRP_NAME like '%'+#agentOrgName#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull ctmCode> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and CTM_CODE like '%'+#ctmCode#+'%') </ifNotNull> <if test="minDateLamp!=null or maxDateLamp!=null " > <if test="minDateLamp!='' or maxDateLamp!='' " > AND exists ( select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN t_to_trans_plan where t_to_trans_plan.CASE_CODE =AB.CASE_CODE and t_to_trans_plan.PART_CODE=AB.taskCode <ifNotNull minDateLamp> and DATEDIFF(DAY, t_to_trans_plan.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE())> #minDateLamp# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull maxDateLamp> and DATEDIFF(DAY, t_to_trans_plan.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) < #maxDateLamp# </ifNotNull>
) </if> </if>
